statements: UPDATE GenderPayGapData SET avg_salary = 50000 WHERE industry = 'Technology' AND region = 'West' AND gender = 'Male';
UPDATE GenderPayGapData SET avg_salary = 60000, region = 'East' WHERE industry = 'Finance' AND gender = 'Female';
UPDATE GenderPayGapData SET avg_salary = 55000.75 WHERE industry = 'Tech' AND region = 'California' AND gender = 'Male';
UPDATE GenderPayGapData SET avg_salary = 60000.50, region = 'New York' WHERE industry = 'Finance' AND gender = 'Female';
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_industry SET average_male_salary = 60000 WHERE industry_id = 1;
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_region SET female_employees_count = 1500, median_male_salary = 70000 WHERE region_id = 3;
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_industry SET average_male_salary = 75000, average_female_salary = 68000 WHERE industry_id = 1;
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_region SET female_employees_count = 450, male_employees_count = 550, median_male_salary = 60000, median_female_salary = 55000 WHERE region_id = 2;
UPDATE industry_pay_gap_data SET avg_pay_gap = 15.75 WHERE industry_id = 1;
UPDATE regional_pay_gap_data SET avg_pay_gap = 12.50 WHERE region_id = 5;
UPDATE industry_pay_gap_data SET avg_pay_gap = 15.75 WHERE industry_id = 3;
UPDATE company_pay_gap_data SET pay_gap = 7.25, company_name = 'XYZ Corporation' WHERE company_id = 5;
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_industry SET pay_gap = 25.50 WHERE industry_id = 1;
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_region SET pay_gap = 15.75, gender = 'female' WHERE region_name = 'North';
UPDATE gender_pay_gap_by_industry SET pay_gap = 15.75 WHERE industry_id = 2 AND gender = 'Male';
UPDATE pay_gap_statistics SET pay_gap = 12.36, year = 2022 WHERE industry_id = 5 AND region_id = 3;
UPDATE gender_stats SET pay_gap = 15.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE advocacy_efforts SET budget = 5000.00, target_gender = 'Male' WHERE initiative_name = 'Equal Pay Initiative';
UPDATE gender_stats SET pay_gap = 20.25, industry = 'Tech' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE employee_data SET gender = 'Female', salary = 70000.00 WHERE id = 5;
